abstract: Every merchant services application I have seen has required a Social Security number and demanded that all card transactions be backstopped by my own assets. My house, my car and my savings are all up for grabs if things go wrong.
snippet: Every merchant services application I have seen has required a Social Security number and demanded that all card transactions be backstopped by my own assets. My house, my car and my savings are all up for grabs if things go wrong.
lead_paragraph: Starting on Tuesday morning, I am going to publish a series of posts about my search for an honest and affordable processor of credit card transactions. It was not an easy search, but I learned a lot — much of which I never wanted to know but some of which I think may be helpful to other business owners.

headline.main: What You Need to Know About Credit Card Processing
